title: Fully furnished One bedroom
posting_body: I’ve a luxurious one bedroom available/ fully furnished apt, covered parking, rooftop with fireplace, on site movie theater
It’s temporarily  available from now to August or September.
I’m moving for work this weekend
Very safe neighborhood, 3-5 minutes to downtown .. 1-3 minutes to all Washington ave night life clubs.
1min walking to Kroger and liquor store
You’ve to have a verifiable income (no fake documents)
I don’t care about your credit as long as you can pay your bills for these 2 or 3 months
